verses.text: \w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*:

\w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* thee \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w bondage|strong="H5650"\w*.
Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* strange \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H0776"\w* thyself \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w graven|strong="H6459"\w* \w thing|strong="H3605"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w likeness|strong="H8544"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w beneath|strong="H8478"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* adore \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*: \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w mighty|strong="H0410"\w*, \w jealous|strong="H7067"\w*, \w visiting|strong="H6485"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, unto \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w third|strong="H8029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7256"\w* \w generation|strong="H8029"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*:

\w And|strong="H4687"\w* shewing mercy unto \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w* \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w them|strong="H0157"\w* that \w love|strong="H0157"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w*, \w and|strong="H4687"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w vain|strong="H7723"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* hold \w him|strong="H0853"\w* guiltless \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w vain|strong="H7723"\w*.
\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* thou \w keep|strong="H6942"\w* \w holy|strong="H6942"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.
\w Six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shalt thou labour, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w works|strong="H5647"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w*, thou \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* thy \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* thy manservant, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* thy \w maidservant|strong="H0519"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* thy \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* within thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w rested|strong="H5117"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

Honour thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou mayest \w be|strong="H3068"\w* longlived \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee.
Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* kill.
Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w commit|strong="H5003"\w* \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w*.
Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w steal|strong="H1589"\w*.
Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* bear \w false|strong="H8267"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* \w against|strong="H7453"\w* thy neighbour.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w covet|strong="H2530"\w* thy neighbourâ€™s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w desire|strong="H7453"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* ass, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6963"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w voices|strong="H6963"\w* \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w flames|strong="H3940"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w smoking|strong="H6226"\w*: \w and|strong="H6963"\w* being terrified \w and|strong="H6963"\w* struck \w with|strong="H3605"\w* fear, \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w afar|strong="H7350"\w* \w off|strong="H7350"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: \w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* thou \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w we|strong="H8085"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*: \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Lord \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w we|strong="H8085"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w Fear|strong="H3374"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* prove \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* dread \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* might \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w afar|strong="H7350"\w* \w off|strong="H7350"\w*. \w But|strong="H0834"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w went|strong="H5066"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w dark|strong="H6205"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6205"\w* \w wherein|strong="H0834"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* shalt thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w You|strong="H0859"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.

\w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H0430"\w* yourselves \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

\w You|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w an|strong="H0935"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w earth|strong="H0127"\w* unto \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* holocausts \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w peace|strong="H8002"\w* \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w where|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w memory|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w*: \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee.

\w And|strong="H4196"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w an|strong="H1129"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* unto \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w hewn|strong="H1496"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou lift \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w tool|strong="H5130"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w*, \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* defiled.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w steps|strong="H4609"\w* unto \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, lest thy \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* discovered.
